blog.name: youcancertainlytry
blog.title: How Do You Want To Do This?

summary: We were watching the episode last night and Jester’s mom, I swear to god like, our attention waxes and wanes as the episode goes...
body:
We were watching the episode last night and Jester’s mom, I swear to god

like, our attention waxes and wanes as the episode goes on, we don’t hang on every word or scene, since it’s usually late when we finally get around to it, but I was riveted

everything about hers and Jester’s interactions were so happy; I’d thought I’d wanted parental angst but what my soul needed was a genuinely loving relationship

my creativity has been sapped for nearly a month and she lifted some sort of a fog in my brain and I’ve been drawing and writing again

the ruby of the sea gives life

tags: i have SO MANY HALF/ALMOST FINISHED Arts and then i just move on to a new thing?
but ive been having lots of trouble drawing anything new lately (probably bc getting used to the cintiq is taking some time and practice)
at least partly?? so i went back to this one to finally finish it at least! so thats one out of like. five. or smth.
anyway ive grown to love pike SO SO SO SO MUCH HOLY SHIT????
not that i ever didnt like her but u know just as w yasha shes not around as often? so i didnt get the time to get to know her as quickly?
but then. when she shows up for a while and gets to be around. SO GOOD. LOVE HER SO MUCH probably up there w my fave characters for sure

tags: I hope you don't mind I drew them
summary: “- - “What happened?” Molly rasps. He presses palm to his face, realizes there are tears on his cheeks. “Shit.” Molly wipes the...
caption:
“- - “What happened?” Molly rasps. He presses palm to his face, realizes there are tears on his cheeks. “Shit.” Molly wipes the dampness with the back of one hand, swallowing. “Why did he do that?”

“I don’t know,” says the stranger. “But I’m sorry.” - -”

Look, I have been thinking about the fic Carry It Until We Die from starkraving A LOT and this moment in their latest chapter is just…<3 

Thank you @punishandenslavesuckers for this amazing story!!
